mapper.select: select * from POLY_REVIEW where midx=#{0} and cidx=#{1} and rDel_yn='N'
mapper.update: update POLY_REVIEW set rDel_yn='Y' where midx=#{midx} and cidx=#{cidx}
update POLY_REVIEW set rLike=rLike+1 where ridx=#{ridx}
update POLY_REVIEW set rLike=rLike-1 where ridx=#{ridx}
mapper.insert: insert into POLY_REVIEW(ridx, midx, cidx, rpoint, rcontent, rlike, rwriteday, rDel_yn, rdeleteday, rip) values(#{ridx}, #{midx}, #{cidx}, #{rpoint}, #{rcontent}, #{rlike}, #{rwriteday}, #{rDel_yn}, NULL, #{rip})
